short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple app to select orders in Zen Stores application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple chrome add on to help select orders in Zen Stores when using the Order Delivery Date Add-on.  

The problem is Zen Stores does not get any delivery date information (just the date the order was made), so this allows you to copy the deliveries for a specified day and import select them in Zen Stores for delivery.

NOTE: If there are less the five deliveries for a specific day Order Delivery Date annoyingly does not allow you to select the order numbers, so you need to go into the weekly calendar view and select and copy your orders in that way.  

The add on will parse all the orders from the copied text and select the orders.  It will also display an alert if an order has not been found in the page.

NOTE 2: Zen Stores only loads a certain amount of orders into the page, you will need to scroll down the page until ALL orders are visible for this to work properly.  I intend to do this automatically in later versions of this extension.
